com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase
Class HBaseMetadata

java.lang.Object
  com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase.HBaseMetadata

public class HBaseMetadata
extends Object

Manages writing and reading table & column schemas, table & column ids, and row & autoincrement counters to and from HBase.

setColumnFamily

@Inject
public void setColumnFamily(String columnFamily)
Sets the column family. Cannot be injected into the constructor directly because of a bug in Cobertura. Called automatically by Guice.

Parameters:
columnFamily - The column family to use

getTableId

public long getTableId(String tableName)
Fetches the table identifier for the specified table name from the underlying data store

Parameters:
tableName - The name of the table this lookup is for, not null or empty
Returns:
The table identifier stored for the table name
